bibl.title: Mons Claudianus. Ostraca graeca et latina. IV. The Quarry-Texts. O. Claud. 682-896. (Documents de fouilles. 47.)
bibl.note: O. Claud. IV, 682-896. - Introduction. - Bibliography. - The Quarry-texts. - Indices. - Appendices: 1. Short Dictionary of Technical Terms in the Present Volume; - 2. How Many People were at Mons Claudianus?; - 3. The Question of Transportation. - Table of concordance.
bibl.seg: BÜLOW-JACOBSEN Adam (Edited with translation and commentary by), Mons Claudianus. Ostraca graeca et latina. IV. The Quarry-Texts. O. Claud. 682-896. (Documents de fouilles. 47.)
Le Caire, Institut français d'Archéologie orientale, 2009, 4°, viii-367 pp., tabl., figg., 1 plan, 75 pll. ISBN 978-2-7247-0494-5. €52.
